Detailed Description

cvmx_dpi_srio_rx_bell#

Reading this register pops an entry off the corresponding SRIO RX doorbell FIFO. The chip supports 16 FIFOs per SRIO interface for a total of 32 FIFOs/Registers. The MSB of the registers indicates the MAC while the 4 LSBs indicate the FIFO. Information on the doorbell allocation can be found in SRIO()_RX_BELL_CTRL.
